title: How to Remove Someone from Your Friend List on Discord

steps.title: Open Discord.
steps.content: Open Discord. It has a blue icon with an image that resembles a game controller with a face. Tap the Discord icon to open Discord. Discord is available for free from the App Store on iPhone and iPad or the Google Play Store on Android.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. It's in the lower-right corner of the Discord app. This displays your profile menu.

steps.title: Tap Your Friends.
steps.content: Tap Your Friends . It's near the bottom of your profile menu. This displays a list of your friends.

steps.title: Tap a friend you want to unfriend.
steps.content: Tap a friend you want to unfriend. The list is automatically sorted alphabetically, so scroll up and down the list to find the user you want to unfriend.

steps.title: Tap ⋯.
steps.content: Tap ⋯ . It is the icon with three dots in the upper-right corner. You'd tap this to find the options to block that profile.

steps.title: Tap Remove Friend.
steps.content: Tap Remove Friend . When you tap the icon, a message will pop up that asks if you mean to remove that user from your friends. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Open Discord.
steps.content: Open Discord. Discord has an icon that resembles a blue icon with game controller that has a face. Click the Discord icon in the Windows Start menu or Applications folder on Mac. You may have Discord set to open automatically when your computer boots up.

steps.title: Go to Friends.
steps.content: Go to Friends . Your app might open to this page automatically, so you don't need to do anything. Otherwise, click the Discord icon to see your direct messages, then click Friends from the menu on the left side of the window.

steps.title: Click the All.
steps.content: Click the All . It's the tab in the center at the top of the client. This displays all your friends.

steps.title: Click ⋮ next to the friend you want to remove.
steps.content: Click ⋮ next to the friend you want to remove. This three-dot menu icon is to the right of their username.

steps.title: Click Remove Friend.
steps.content: Click Remove Friend . It's in the drop-down menu that appears when you This displays a confirmation pop-up.

steps.title: Click Remove Friend.
steps.content: Click Remove Friend . This removes your friend from your friend's list.

steps.title: Open Discord.
steps.content: Open Discord. You can block someone using the Discord mobile app or desktop app. Click or tap the Discord icon to open Discord.

steps.title: Click or tap a person's username or profile image.
steps.content: Click or tap a person's username or profile image. You can do so in a server, channel, direct message (DM), or in your friend's list. On the mobile app, this displays their profile page. On the desktop app, this displays a chat with their profile page on the right.

steps.title: Click or tap ⋯.
steps.content: Click or tap ⋯ . It's in the upper-right corner of their profile page. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click or tap Block.
steps.content: Click or tap Block . It's in the menu that appears when you click or tap the icon with three dots. This displays a confirmation pop-up.

steps.title: Click or tap Block.
steps.content: Click or tap Block . It's the red button in the confirmation pop-up. This confirms that you want to block the user and blocks them.

steps.title: Will they know you've unfriended them on Discord?
steps.content: Will they know you've unfriended them on Discord? Friends will not get notified when you unfriend them. They can only tell that they've been unfriended if they look at your profile and see "Add friend."

steps.title: What happens to DMs when you unfriend someone?
steps.content: What happens to DMs when you unfriend someone? DMs will remain in the DM section until they close it. Unfriending someone does not mean that the direct message automatically closes, but they might not be able to continue to send you messages once you unfriend them, depending on your privacy settings.

steps.title: How can I tell if someone unfriended me?
steps.content: How can I tell if someone unfriended me? The easiest way is to check your friend's list. If you don't see them listed in your friends list, they most likely removed you as a friend.

steps.title: What's the difference between unfriending someone and blocking them?
steps.content: What's the difference between unfriending someone and blocking them? Blocking is a way to prevent someone from interacting with you. Unfriending someone, however, allows the other person to interact with you. Here are some major differences: When you block someone, you won't see their comments in a mutual Discord server. This isn't true when you remove someone from your Friends, however. If you unfriend someone, they can still see what you say on mutual servers, and vice-versa. When you block someone, they will not be able to send you a friend request. If you remove someone from your Friends, they can send you a friend request if they notice that you're no longer friends. A blocked user cannot DM you; they will get an error that their message cannot be delivered. Depending on your direct message settings, people not on your friend list cannot send you private messages. Blocked users cannot see your profile info like your "About Me" section. Unfriended users can see this information when they look at your profile. Discord does not notify the other person if you block or unfriend them.
